column1: EVTDESC87301;The duchies of Schleswig and Holstein have long been united and considered indivisible under the Danish crown
column2: but a question of royal claim to the duchies combined with the Holsteinian desire to join in the larger German Confederation to the south has led to considerable difficulty for King Frederick VII. The treatment of Danish people in Schleswig living under Holsteinian domination has led to a call for the duchy to be incorporated into $COUNTRY$ proper. This is unlikely to be looked on favorably by the conservative German aristocracy in Holstein.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC87302;The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ crown wishes to annex the Duchy of Schleswig
column2: which has long been considered indivisible from the Duchy of Holstein. The German aristocracy is enraged by this move. They believe their future lies with the German Confederation to the south
column3: but the Duke of Augustenberg has a stronger claim to Schleswig than the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ King. Schleswig-Holstein must forge its own path

column1: EVTDESC87303;The Danish crown looks to impede upon the rights and lands of our brothers in Schleswig-Holstein. We must look to their defense!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC87304;The Danish crown looks to impede upon the rights and lands of our brothers in Schleswig-Holstein. We must look to their defense!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC87305;The arrogant German aristocrats in Holstein have declared they intend to pursue a future with the German Confederation to the south
column2: and consider Schleswig an indivisible part of their territory. $COUNTRY_ADJ$ militants are angrily calling for the military to step in
column3: though some fear this may lead to war with the Germans.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC87306;The question of Schleswig-Holstein's place within the German Confederation has now finally been resolved-- in our favor. This will have larger repercussions
column2: as the free German states will start to see that $COUNTRY$ is the true leader of the confederation;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC87307;It seems peace and friendship will prevail in the German Confederation with our rivals looking for amiable terms about the entrance of Schleswig-Holstein into the Confederation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC87308;Our North German rivals have made their move and seized the entirety of Schleswig-Holstein for themselves we must respond!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC87309;Now that order has been restored to Schleswig-Holstein
column2: international pressure is mounting to uphold treaties regarding the region. Failure to restore nominal independence to the duchies and keep them united will result in tensions between $COUNTRY$ and other European powers
column3: and possibly war with the German Confederation to the south.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
